name: budgetwise
description: **BudgetWise** is a full-stack budget management app.   Track your income and expenses, set monthly budgets, and view analytics with clean dashboards.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n DOCKER,API,WEB -c yellow,blue,green "cd infra && docker compose up -d" "cd api/budgetwise-js-api && node src/index.js" "cd budgetwise-web && npm run dev"
